biotools.summary:
A multi-class SVM classification to distinguish between non-coding RNAs in Viridiplantae.

Prediction model for non-coding RNA.

Computational Structural Biology Lab.

NCodR : A multi-class SVM classifier using single sequence repeat signatures to distinguish between ncRNA types.
